title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Dec 7 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Dec 7 2021
description:
The left's approach to crime is exactly why there is rampant crime. 80th Anniversary of Pearl Harbor and why the Greatest Generation must always be honored in our history. Brandon Judd, president of the National Border Patrol Council, which represents rank-and-file Border Patrol agents nationwide, gives an update on the border. Transgender sports destroys the entire fabric of women's athletics and why people are afraid to speak out.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
